description.message: The best way to focus that photo or image and add it to one photo gallery with ambient lighting effects.

textfoot.message: This software is licensed under the CC-GNU GPL. To view a copy of this license, visit

descontextmenus.message: Show the context menu for Ambient Aurea

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

desicon.message: Hide the pageaction icon in the omnibar

desambilight.message: Show you the atmosphere lighting effect of the current image

desambilight4color.message: 选择 4 种环绕在图像周围的颜色：

desambilightrangespreadradius.message: Positive values increase the size of the shadow, negative values decrease the size.

desambilightrangeblurradius.message: Lower values will sharpen the shadow, higher values will make them more blurred.

desopacity.message: Choose the opacity level outside of the frame.

dessharebar.message: This shows the share bar for the current image.

descount.message: This show right below the total number of images found in the gallery.

desslideshow.message: This add on the top of your website an extra play button. So you can start the slideshow in that gallery.

ratetitle.message: 请为我的扩展打分和评价

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!

resetbrowserextension.message: 重置 Ambient Aurea 设置

areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about Ambient Aurea?

tellothers.message: 将您的观点告诉给别人

desambientaurea.message: Where your photos come to life is also available for your computer.

titeldownloadaaupgrade.message: The upgrade adds support for focusing selected images, and will display a gallery of images on the site.

titeldownloadupgradepropermenubar.message: Add back the black menubar on the Google website.

titeldownloadupgradefinancetoolbar.message: This shows you the real time stock market information.

titeldownloadupgradefullscreen.message: With this extension you can easy go to full screen. This for image, video and webpage.

titeldownloadupgradezoom.message: Zoom in or out on web content using the zoom button for more comfortable reading.

titeldownloadupgradedatetoday.message: This extension show the analog clock in the menu bar. When you click on the icon, it shows you the current time; month and day of the week.

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser.

titeldownloadupgrade.message: The entire page will be fading to dark, so you can watch the video as if you were in the cinema.

showremember.message: Do not show this reminder page again when I open the options page

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Ambient Aurea Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Ambient Aurea extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

sharetextd.message: Ambient Aurea extension is the Best extension for my web browser. Download it and try it yourself!

titeldoesntwork.message: Ambient Aurea doesn't work on this web page. Please try another page.

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

desremrate.message: If you like Ambient Aurea™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

desatmossolidcolor.message: Choose your one solid glow effect color
